text: Ej mardum, haroina, Mo sumoro az jak mardu jak zan ʙijofaridem, (ki on du Odam va Havo alajhimassalomand.) Va sumoro camo'atho va qaʙilaho kardem, to jakdigarro ʙisinosed. Alʙatta, giromitarini sumo nazdi Alloh parhezgortarini sumost. Pas faxr kardan ʙo nasaʙro tark kuned. Haroina, Alloh ogoh va ʙoxaʙar ast
